item.title: Modularization
item.description: “Modularization is the activity of dividing a product or system into interchangeable modules.” (stolen somewhere) As long as things stay simple and you have just a bunch of controls, there’s not much logic and just a few data fields you don’t have to worry much about Modularization. However, if you’re building a whole application things will quickly change - the markup grows and grows with some undesired effects on productivity:
